      • setJVMName

        protected static void setJVMName(int port,
                                 String iface)
        Attempts to set the vm agent property that identifies the vm's display name. This is the name displayed for tools such as jconsole and jps when using auto-dicsovery. When using a fat-jar, this provides a much more identifiable name
        Parameters:
        port - The listening port
        iface - The bound interface

      • getAgentProperties

        protected static Properties getAgentProperties()
        Returns the agent properties
        Returns:
        the agent properties or null if reflective call failed

      • setLogbackInternal

        protected static void setLogbackInternal(String logFileName,
                                         String rollPattern,
                                         boolean keepConsoleOpen)
        Sets the logback system property, tsdb.logback.file and then reloads the internal file based logging configuration. The property will not be set if it was already set, allowing the value to be set by a standard command line set system property.
        Parameters:
        logFileName - The name of the file logback will log to.
        rollPattern - The pattern specifying the rolling file pattern, inserted between the file name base and extension. So for a log file name of /var/log/opentsdb.log and a pattern of _%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i, the configured fileNamePattern would be /var/log/opentsdb_%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.%i.log
        keepConsoleOpen - If true, will keep the console appender open, otherwise closes it and logs exclusively to the file.

      • insertPattern

        protected static String insertPattern(String logFileName,
                                      String rollPattern)
        Merges the roll pattern name into the file name
        Parameters:
        logFileName - The log file name
        rollPattern - The rolling log file appender roll pattern
        Returns:
        the merged file pattern

      • setLogbackExternal

        protected static void setLogbackExternal(String fileName)
        Reloads the logback configuration to an external file
        Parameters:
        fileName - The logback configuration file
